name: Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry
description: A magical school where young witches and wizards receive their education in the art of magic.

name: Diagon Alley
description: A hidden shopping district in London for all magical supplies, including wands and potions ingredients.

name: Forbidden Forest
description: A dangerous forest near Hogwarts, inhabited by various magical creatures and mysteries.

name: Tatooine
description: A desert planet and the home of Anakin Skywalker, later known as Darth Vader.

name: Coruscant
description: The bustling capital of the galaxy, with its towering skyscrapers and the heart of galactic politics.

name: Endor
description: The forest moon of Endor, known for the Battle of Endor and the Ewok inhabitants.

name: Lost City of Atlantis
description: An ancient and mythical underwater city, said to hold advanced technology and secrets.

name: Valley of the Kings
description: A historic burial site in Egypt, filled with elaborate tombs of pharaohs.

name: Croft Manor
description: The ancestral home of Lara Croft, filled with artifacts and mysteries.

name: Vulcan
description: The homeworld of the Vulcan species, known for their logical and highly intellectual culture.

name: Klingon Homeworld
description: The homeworld of the Klingon Empire, a warrior culture with a strict code of honor.

name: Bajoran Wormhole
description: A stable wormhole near Bajor, leading to the distant Gamma Quadrant.

name: The Mad Hatter's Tea Party
description: A whimsical and chaotic tea party hosted by the Mad Hatter and attended by colorful characters.

name: Cheshire Cat's Forest
description: A mysterious forest inhabited by the enigmatic and disappearing Cheshire Cat.

name: Queen of Hearts' Castle
description: The extravagant palace of the tyrannical Queen of Hearts, known for her love of beheadings.

name: Stark Tower
description: The high-tech headquarters of Tony Stark (Iron Man) and a hub for superhero activities.

name: Asgard
description: The realm of the Norse gods, including Thor, Loki, and Odin.

name: Xavier's School for Gifted Youngsters
description: A school for mutants, run by Professor Charles Xavier (Professor X) and a safe haven for mutants with special abilities.

name: Emerald City
description: The vibrant and colorful capital of the Land of Oz, ruled by the Wizard.

name: Yellow Brick Road
description: The iconic pathway that leads to the Emerald City, guiding travelers on their adventures.

name: Wicked Witch's Castle
description: The eerie castle of the Wicked Witch of the West, a place of danger and magic.

name: San Fransokyo Institute of Technology
description: The prestigious university where Hiro Hamada and his friends attend and innovate.

name: Lucky Cat Café
description: A cozy café where Hiro and his friends often gather to relax and socialize.

name: Krei Tech Industries
description: A cutting-edge technology company that plays a significant role in the world of Big Hero 6.

name: Cair Paravel
description: The royal castle of Narnia, where the Pevensie children rule as kings and queens.

name: The White Witch's Castle
description: The fortress of the White Witch, a powerful and evil ruler of Narnia.

name: Talking Beavers' Dam
description: A dam built by the friendly and talking beavers in Narnia.

name: Ponyville
description: A charming town in Equestria, where the main characters of My Little Pony reside.

name: Canterlot
description: The regal capital city of Equestria, home to Princess Celestia and Princess Luna.

name: Everfree Forest
description: A mysterious and untamed wilderness in Equestria, home to many magical creatures.
